plot: A hidden camera show in which people think they are playing practical jokes on their friends, but find out that the joke's really on them.
plot_en: A hidden camera show in which people think they are playing practical jokes on their friends, but find out that the joke's really on them.
plot_es: A hidden camera show in which people think they are playing practical jokes on their friends, but find out that the joke's really on them.
title: Joke's on You
